answers.answer: Saying prayers, and good luck when you finally do take the glucose test!!
Will pray for her and you to :)
will be praying, hope everything turn out fine.
Thanks everyone they are waiting to hear when the surgery is I will keep everyone updated

Thanks everyone I passed my gestational diabetes test needed under 140 and got 132. Also the baby came through surgery fine now they are just waiting for her to heal so she can go home they said its probably gonna be about 10-14 days before she can go home

question: First off I went to the dr this morning and waited 45 minutes to find out they couldn't do my gestational diabetes test cause she didn't have the fluid I have to drink so I gotta go back and do it tomorrow. Also everyone a friend of mine can really use some prayers her newborn Hadent been keeping anything down this weekend so she took her to the dr and found out she has a blockage so they have to do surgery everyone please pray for her.
title: Today just isn't a good day
